snippet.title: Pixel Game Maker Series Puzzle Pedestrians PV
snippet.description:
『Pixel Game Maker Series Puzzle Pedestrians』
Puzzle Pedestrians is not your ordinary puzzle game!
Observe and guide pedestrians to help them have a safe time on their way to work, school, or otherwise fulfilling your mission objectives. With your toolkit of items such as bees and bananas, you’ll help moms deliver lunches to forgetful children, deliver more foot traffic to struggling shops, and so much more!
Planned and Supervision by Kenichi Nishi of Route 24, famous for his work on games such as “Moon: Remix RPG Adventure”, “L.O.L.: Lack of Love”, and “Chibi-Robo!”.
Release on March 4th 2021 at Nintendo Switch ™ / Steam!

Pixel Game Maker Official Web
https://tkool.jp/act/en/index.html

Pixel Game Maker Official Twitter:
https://twitter.com/PixelGameMaker
※This game is made with "Pixel Game Maker MV".
ⓒ2021 Gotcha Gotcha Games
